product_name: BAJAJ CONSUMER CARE Hair Styling Kit - 2 x Hair Serum + Vega Hair Straightener

product_specifications.how_to_apply: Hair SerumApply a small amount to wet or dry hairSpread evenly through mid-lengths and endsComplete your hair styling as usualHair StraightenerUse the straightener on clean hair.Apply heat protective serum.Divide the hair into sections with help of comb.Once you have set the right temperature of the straightener, uniformly pick up every section of your hair and straighten it. The heated sides should touch, with your hair resting between them. Clamp the straightener on you hair sections and run it down the length up to 2-3 times.
